actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.

actions.subcommittee: National Parks, Forests and Public Lands
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks, Forests and Public Lands.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on National Parks, Forests and Public Lands

official_title: To designate the Ludlow Massacre National Historic Landmark in the State of Colorado, and for other purposes.
short_title: Ludlow Massacre National Historic Landmark Act

summary.text: Ludlow Massacre National Historic Landmark Act - Designates the Ludlow Tent Colony Site (a site where striking miners and their families lived during the 1913-1914 Colorado coal strike) in Las Animas County, Colorado, as the "Ludlow Massacre National Historic Landmark."

titles.title: Ludlow Massacre National Historic Landmark Act
To designate the Ludlow Massacre National Historic Landmark in the State of Colorado, and for other purposes.
